tool.name: Append Annotation [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Append new annotation columns with single label to the dataset.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --list-values Annotation_Pair_List --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.append_annotation_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Dataset
param.label: Upstream Dataset
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: value
param.label: Value
param.help: List of string pairs representing the new annotation and its label. Each pair should have this format: <new annotation column name>:<value of the annotation> without the '<' and '>' characters. The values must be a single string or numeric value

tool.help: **Append Annotation [SPAC] [DMAP]** Append new annotation columns with single label to the dataset.\ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
